description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

Big Big World - Emilia

模唱片段：

Outside it's now raining
And tears are falling from my eyes
Why did it have to happen
Why did it all have to end
I'm a big big girl
In a big big world
It's not a big big thing if you leave me
But I do do feel
that I do do will miss you much
Miss you much.
I have your arms around me ooooh like fire
But when I open my eyes
You're gone.

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Big Big World

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

话题：

The traditional libraries are doomed to be replaced by digital library?
 

范例1：

The above pictures vividly demonstrate that these glittering e-readers not only facilitate our reading habit but also rock our deeply-rooted traditions. Even though the e-readers have many advantages than traditional libraries, such as having a digital library at your finger, taking away books everywhere and reading it anytime, the e-readers haven’t the ability to completely kick out the motor-and-brick library from the spotlight.

First of all, the library’s worst weakness – its immovableness, is just the greatest advantage over the showy electronic gadgets. Library is a public place, not a private-owned commercial property. Everyone knows where the library is. Everyone knows that it’s the last way that we can resort to when we face crisis in the world. Everyone knows that it can bestow us not only knowledge and skills but also the spiritual motivation. When I sit down in the chair of a silent library, the tranquil surroundings make me forget the pass of time. This experience could never be touched by the e-readers.

Equipped the internet access, the e-reader is indeed a killer tool to challenge the dominant position of library in people’ life because people can collaborate and share their feelings about a book, even in real time. However, it’s the library’s strong point, not the e-reader's. In library’s lobby, people can freely exchange their opinions about a topic a book without the help of outsider tools. Moreover, this kind of communication is far better than that after shallow reading.

Above all, even though advanced e-readers are eagerly taking the position of library, like a noisy teenager rashly grabbing the crown of father in the family life, library is still a solid rock of our society.

 

范例2：

Last summer holiday, I brought a kindle paperwhite from Amazon. The moment I touched it, I proclaimed that my Reading Revolution commenced. A lot of friends told me that Kindlepw’s e-ink design perfectly substituted for ordinary books and its internal memory was large enough to store thousands of books. For a very long period, Kindle had replaced paper books to be my most intimate company and I even thought that paper books can completely be kicked out of my life. However, gradually, I realized how unilateral my understanding of books was! From one side, I compared Kindle with paper books and ignorantly claimed that Kindle’s convenience overweighed ordinary books’ awkwardness. But what I neglected was paper books ‘cultural characteristic, which was handed down from generation to generation and became the brilliant treasure of human beings. While e-books are so cheap and easy to obtain, few people really cherish them.

Furthermore, paper books nurture people’s disposition. In current society, the flying update of electronic products stirs our mind. It is not hard to notice that almost everyone obsesses himself with e-products, such as smart phone, ipad and so on, which steal our time and space to immerse ourselves into our own mind. Fortunately, we have paper books. The aroma of ink and handfeel of paper help us escape from the chill e-world.

I love paper books. They are warm, friendly. They make me feel peace and rich.

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：Sean杨

22秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

God's Pocket is a district in South Philadelphia, a ragged blue-collar community where people just scrape by, the kind of place that when bizarre things happen, they say you have to come from God's Pocket to understand. Then there's Mickey who doesn't and whose wayward step-son has just been killed in an incident work. His mother wants to know what happened. And Mickey loves his wife and wants to help.上帝的口袋是南费城的一个区，里面住的多是潦倒的蓝领人士，节衣缩食勉强维持生计。在这种地方若是发生了什么怪异的事件，人们只会说你若是来自上帝的口袋便早该见怪不怪了。但是米基并不知道这些，他任性的继子刚刚在一场工作事故中死亡，母亲自然想要知道是如何发生的。米基深爱着他的妻子并且想要帮助她。

语调示意图：

 

重点单词发音讲解： 
ragged /ˈræɡ.ɪd/ a. (of clothes) not in good condition; torn
bizarre /bɪˈzɑː/ a. very strange and unusual
wayward /ˈweɪ.wəd/ a. (especially of a person's behaviour) often changing, selfish and difficult to control
Philadelphia /filə'delfjə/ n. 费城

description:
本节目为沪江部落一档美语发音模仿节目，每期节目选取30秒左右的慢速VOA新闻内容，主持人亲自朗读示范模仿发音，对发音要点进行讲解，并配以详细的语音语调示意图，手把手教你练就地道美音范儿！想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？

去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：曲值

30秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

The World Health Organization estimates that, in 2012, 3.7 million people under age 60 died earlier than expected because of outdoor air pollution. The WHO says nearly 90 percent of these deaths happened in low- and middle-income countries. 世界卫生组织估计，2012年户外空气污染导致了370万60岁以下的人早亡，并称近90%的死亡者来自中低收入国家。

重点单词发音讲解：

world noun \ˈwər(-ə)ld\
world
health noun, often attributive \ˈhelth also ˈheltth\
health
or·ga·ni·za·tion noun \ˌȯr-gə-nə-ˈzā-shən, ˌȯrg-nə-\
organization
es·ti·mate verb \ˈes-tə-ˌmāt\
estimate
pol·lu·tion noun \pə-ˈlü-shən\
pollution

title: 呼吸已是困难(1/2)

description:
On March 11th 2004, a series of bombs exploded on early-morning commuter trains in Madrid, killing almost 200 people. It was the worst terror attack on European soil in recent history and came just three days before Spain was due to hold general elections. Mike Lanchin has been hearing from two people on either side of the country's political divide.

Madrid, March 11th, 2004. Europe in shock, Spain in mourning as multiple bombs strike Madrid's morning rush hour.

It's very hard to me to explain, what I see in the station. The body of the people burn, people crying and terrible.

At least ten bombs have exploded on trains packed with passengers, as they approach Madrid's Atocha Station.

First 15, then 30, then 60, finally over 170 dead, in the day of devastated lives, and shock turned to anger.

We are shock, I are shock and everybody rabia, anger, anger yes yes.

I remember very well the morning of 11th March, I was having a coffee, and listening the radio.

Trinidad Jiménez, a senior figure in Spain's Socialist Party, then in opposition, is at home. She's following in horror the first news reports. She decides to call a colleague in the mayor's office.

title: 西班牙的恐怖袭击（有声）

description:
But first, straight to the UN headquarters in New York where a meeting of the Security Council has been discussing the escalating crisis in Ukraine. Ukraine's interim Prime Minister Arseniy Yatsenyuk insisting that Russia's intervention in Crimea was unacceptable.

My country has faced a military aggression of a neighbouring country which is the P5 member. This aggression has no reasons and no grounds. This is absolutely and entirely unacceptable in the 21st century to resolve any kind of conflict with tanks, artillery and boots on the ground.

He also spoke directly to the Russian Federation in Russian saying there was still time to resolve the crisis peacefully and he got an immediate answer from Russia's ambassador to the UN Vitaly Churkin.

I'm going to respond directly to a direct question to me by Mr Yatsenyuk. Russia does not want war and nor do the Russians, and I'm convinced that Ukrainians don't want this either. Furthermore, and this is something which I want to especially underscore, we do not see any premises to view and interpret the situation in such terms. We don't want any further exacerbation of the situation. It is not Russia which unfolded this spiral of violence which recently of these last few months has determined the development of Ukraine.

title: 乌克兰临时总理现身说法（有声）

description:
图为迪迪埃.德罗巴。绰号“魔兽”

《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是关于魔兽告别国家队的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注。

SUMMARY：

德罗巴是切尔西的中流砥柱，秋季人品都上佳。他同时亦是非洲科特迪瓦国家足球队的队长，灵魂之所在。在本届世界杯上有着不俗的表现。但是36岁的他早已过了球员的当打之年，不得不挥泪阔别国家队。这位非洲队员的品质是值得世界球坛所学习的。

CONTENT：
The Chelsea striker has called time on his 12 year Ivory Coast career following 65 goals in 104 appearances for Les Elephants, during a spell that included three World Cup showings.
Drogba, who returned to The Blues last month following a two-year hiatus in China and with Galatasaray, has spoken of his sadness at calling time on his international career.
"I'm proud to have captained this team for eight years and to have contributed to putting my country on the world stage," the 36-year-old explained.
"It's with much sadness that I've decided to retire from international football.
"I can't convey enough thanks to the fans for allthe love and support during these years. All my goals, all my caps, all our victories are for you.
"I owe much gratitude to my team-mates, the players with whom I've shared all these emotions and I wish them all much success for the future."
 
KEYWORDS:  
Didier Drogba 迪迪埃.德罗巴
Call on  宣布停职，结束（网络上没这种意思，下次遇到不认识的词组可以查阅纸质字典哦·）
Striker  前锋 （足球术语）
Ivory Coast 科特迪瓦（科特迪瓦在法语的意思是“象牙的海岸”（Côte为海岸，d'表属性，是de在元音前的省略，Ivoire为象牙），故以往不少地方采用意译称呼此国：中文为“象牙海岸”、英文为Ivory Coast等）
 Les Elephants, 科特迪瓦国家足球队
Hiatus 间隙，间隔，空隙
Galatasaray 拉塔萨拉依（土耳其俱乐部）
Cap 帽子，这里用帽子指代敬意，因为英文中有脱帽致敬之意
Owe to 将···归功于
 
REFERENCE：
http://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/news/chelsea-hero-didier-drogba-announces-4026264
 
【沪江英语小编】大家在查看主持人提供的翻译版本前，可以先自己进行尝试翻译练习，只有在不断的翻译中翻译能力才能有所提升哦！

轻松注册沪江，马上参与【英闻天天译】节目练翻译→

本期节目参考译文：（参考译文由该节目主持人提供，仅供参考，欢迎大家讨论）

参考译文1：

这位切尔西前锋宣布结束为期12年的科特迪瓦国家队生涯。在为国家队效力期间，他拢共出场104次，打进65粒进球，更三度参加世界杯。
在阔别切尔西两年的这段时间内，德罗巴先是效力于中超，随即转战拉塔萨拉依，继而于上月重返蓝军。对于宣布退出国家队一事，他本人则深表遗憾。
“我任国家队队长已有8年，为助祖国登上世界舞台亦尽心尽力。对此，我感到无比的骄傲。”现年36岁的德罗巴如是说道。
“对于做出要退出国家队这一决定，我也万般不舍。”
“而对于所有那些在这三年里给予我爱与鼓励的球迷们，言语已然不足以表达谢意，我全部的进球，敬意，乃至胜利，都是属于你们的。”
“这其中大部分的谢意都要归功于我的队友，是他们同我悲喜与共。在此，我祝愿他们未来可以取得更大的成功。”

title: 英闻天天译: 魔兽告别国家队

description:
《标准美音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目（戳我去参加节目>>），主持人截取30秒左右的英语音频，然后对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评，想要练习纯正美音的童鞋赶快行动起来吧！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：（小六百）

20秒音频：

小编模仿音频： 

模仿文本： The interim agreement requires Iran to stop enriching uranium at current levels, freeze further work on centrifuges, and halt major activities at the Arak reactor, designed to produce plutonium.
The agreement also suspends some U.S. and EU economic sanctions and prohibits new ones for the life of the six-month deal.该临时协议要求伊朗在现有水平停止浓缩铀，暂停后续的离心分离机工作，停止制造钚的阿拉克反应堆的主要工作。
协议也暂停了一些美国和欧盟的经济制裁，并且禁止在六个月的协议有效期内采取新的制裁措施。

title: 伊朗核谈矛盾尚未解决(1/2)

description:
《美剧天天秀》节目是沪江部落一档模仿类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语水平，在轻松看美剧的同时锻炼大家的口语能力。积极参与的童鞋还会得到主持的专业点评哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

原录音：

原文：

【Elena】Stefan. Stefan.
【Stefan】He killed her. He killed Zach. He killed Tanner. He turned Vicki. I have to kill him.
【E】No. You can't do that.
【S】Why are you trying to save him? Elena? He's never gonna change. Don't you see that? He's never gonna change.
【E】I'm not trying to save him. I'm trying to save you. You have no idea what this will do to you. Please, Stefan.
【S】Everywhere that I go, pain and death follow. Damon follows me. no more.
【E】Stefan, please. please, just--just talk to me. Let me be here for you.Talk to me.
【S】No. You were right to stay away from me.
